item.title: Add Refiner to Refinement Web Part using CSOM and PowerShell
item.description: The refinement web part present by default on a search results page help to narrow down search results. The inter connected web parts present in a search result page are Search Box Web Part Search Navigation Search Results Refinement Web Part The refinement web part used refiners which areÂ managed properties bound to crawled properties created by search crawl. The managed properties must be enabled as refiners to be able to use on the web part.
